summary: This document is a Know Your Customer (KYC) record for Jeffrey Epstein and associated accounts at Deutsche Bank. It details the relationships, account ownership, and financial information related to Epstein and his trust, including trustees and beneficiaries. The document highlights the financial connections and the management of Epstein's assets through various accounts. This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information related to various individuals and entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including details about their financial profiles, relationships with Deutsche Bank, and the structure of the Butterfly Trust. It highlights the due diligence performed on these parties and their connections to Epstein.
